"``.. note:: The length of these strings is 4 including the whitespace at the end..Expected output can be quoted or unquoted.. code-block:: RST .. code-block:: python >>> n = [ ... "zero", ... "one", ... "two", ... ] >>> for c, i in enumerate(n): ... print(c, i) 0 zero 1 one 2 twoStyles can be configured in a pyproject.toml file.. code-block:: toml [tool.readmetester] style = "monokai"
